forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 98. Heat index values as high as 101. West wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 71. Heat index values as high as 98. North wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight settles over Boston, the air carries a warmth hinting at the day just passed—a day painted with sunlight and layered with a palpable energy. The sun brimmed high, wrapping the city in a golden embrace, nudging the temperature toward a sultry peak. It was a summer day, no doubt, one that coaxed locals out into the streets, with the heat index hinting at a humidity that stirred a languid kind of vigor, encouraging folks to savor ice-cold refreshments under the shade of leafy trees.

Tonight, as the sky darkens, the day transforms. The lingering warmth hangs in the air, a gentle memory of the sun’s farewell, as gentle breezes murmur through the night. With temperatures dipping to a comfortable 71, it invites a relaxed atmosphere, perfect for leisurely strolls along the Charles. Long sleeves or a light jacket might be prudent as the evening moves into its cool embrace. Consider a quiet dinner at an outdoor café, savoring the flavors of late summer, as the sounds of laughter and conversation weave seamlessly into the nocturnal symphony of the city. If the urge to venture out is strong, perhaps a visit to a nearby park with friends will provide the kind of ambiance where conversations can unfold amidst the soft glow of lamplight.

This evening presents a rare blend of warmth and comfort, urging one to enjoy the mundane pleasures of life. Dress lightly and enjoy the simple act of being outdoors as the urban landscape unveils its charm beneath the deepening twilight.
